modName: Ferrous Dragon Armor - Northern Imperial Armor
summary: Add a new standalone complete retexture of the iron armor to fit your Imperial character.
descriptionHtml:
Ferrous Dragon Armor - Northern Imperial Armor
Thank you insaneOhflex for making a video showcasing the mod!
[youtube]FvDZXMCwyB0[/youtube]

[img]http://i1162.photobucket.com/albums/q524/exraycatt/2012-07-19_00066.jpg[/img]

This is a retexture of the iron armor set converted into a standalone armor set.  Meshes are included because I added environment maps to the armor to enhance the metallic properties.  The armor can be created at the forge but you must have the \"Advanced Armors\" perk, and some extra ingredients above what you would need to just forge regular iron armor.  

To forge the armor you will need:
Iron
Steel
Corundum
Silver
Leather

This armor gives stats just a tad below Orcish in terms of protection

Enjoy!

If you want some weapons that go nicely with the armor you can find a full set of retextured iron weapons here:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17411]HD IRON WEAPONS[/url]

If you want a few bows, arrows, and quivers that go with it you can find them here:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20573]HD Bow and Arrow Retex[/url]

Installation:
1) Use NMM
or
2) Drop the \"data\" folder into your \"Skyrim\" root folder and choose to merge folders if asked
3) Make sure the \"Ferrous Dragon Iron Armor Standalone.esp\" is activated in NMM or your Data Files

Uninstallation:
1) Use NMM
or
2) delete the .esp from your data folder and the \"ferrousdragon\" folders from:

Skyrim/data/textures/armors and
Skyrim/data/meshes/armors folders
author: XRC
